attributes.action: Introduce Vaccine Passports at the soonest, practical, opportunity
attributes.additional_details:
By ensuring people are vaccinated we can reopen all sectors of society safe in the knowledge that, irrespective of who is there, the risk of spreading infection is minimised.
The overall health of a nation cannot be a matter of personal preference, if someone makes a conscious decision not to get vaccinated, then they should not be entitled to the 'access all areas' available to those who have.
Carrying this virus can be deadly, similar to drink-driving or carrying a weapon!?
attributes.background:
Vaccine Passports should be introduced to protect the long term health of our community. 
People who choose not to get vaccinated are putting peoples lives, & the effectiveness of the NHS, at risk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297

If you would like the Government to create new restrictions relating to vaccine passports, we could accept a petition about this, but it would need to be clear what restrictions you wanted to be imposed.
